title: How can technology help with learning a new language? - Quora

response.answer_text: For my language learning, I learned from the younger generation to use the technology of today to my advantage. Al done on my phone. Downloaded pdf files, memes to read and MP3 audio (books) to listen to for playlists. Do this mostly in deathtime waiting. bought ears and a headphone and an extra SD card for storing. Listen to playlists when biking to work (That's why the headphone for reducing the windsound in the background) an FM transmitter so I can listen to a playlist even on my old car radio (old without Bluetooth) changed the language settings of some devices like my phone and navigation device. Even Siri speaks foreign languages. Active on Facebook in my target language, same in Quora and other social apps. Using a dictionary never has been so easy. Writing and having changed the language settings comes with prespelling advantages. Yes. today's technology can serve you well, by the way, I'm 60
